about_the_game:
With 980, we are starting a new type of puzzle collection - a Black & White series of photos that are different from what you'd usually expect. It is, of course, free for all owners of the game. We really hope you'll like this new type of challenge and enjoy Masters of Puzzle in a slightly different way.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, and 1000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original digital photo with applied additional filters and effects. The image is rather unusual and might be difficult to assemble especially in larger tilesets. It will provide a nice challenge for both beginners and veterans alike.
detailed_description:
With 980, we are starting a new type of puzzle collection - a Black & White series of photos that are different from what you'd usually expect. It is, of course, free for all owners of the game. We really hope you'll like this new type of challenge and enjoy Masters of Puzzle in a slightly different way.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, and 1000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original digital photo with applied additional filters and effects. The image is rather unusual and might be difficult to assemble especially in larger tilesets. It will provide a nice challenge for both beginners and veterans alike.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change

name: Masters of Puzzle - Black and White - 980

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change

short_description: A puzzle box with Black & White photography for the Masters of Puzzle game.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
